name: .WMDL File Extension
summary: Learn about .WMDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: A WMDL file is a 3D model used in Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze. It provides the geometry for a game level. Each level uses its own WMDL file.

content: Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze is the 2014 entry in the Donkey Kong Country series. It was developed by Retro Studios and is available for the Wii U and Nintendo Switch (via a re-release in 2018).
The game stores levels' geometry in WMDL files. These files also contain the textures and materials used to skin a level.

instructions: WMDL files are not meant to be opened. Donkey Kong Country Tropical Freeze loads and uses WMDL files as players play the game.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
